channel.title: graph making on Andriy Koval
channel.description: Recent content in graph making on Andriy Koval

item.title: Income Assistance in Alberta
item.description: Graphing the trends of assured income for severely handicapped (AISH)

item.title: Florida Suicides (2) - Youth Trends
item.description: Graphing the trends of suicides in Florida from 2006 to 2017 among youth between 10 and 24 years of age.

item.title: Visualizing the Pandemic
item.description: Demonstrating how to 1) build interactive visualizationsusing plotly::ggplotly(), 2) compute relative timelines for each country and 3) plot sequence of key events for cross-country comparison.

item.title: Florida Suicides (1) - General Trends
item.description: Graphing the trends of suicides in Florida from 2006 to 2017, exploring the differences in age, gender, and race among persons 10 years and older

item.title: Florida Demographic Growth
item.description: This blogposts shows how to extract population estimates data reported by the Florida Department of Health and prepare them for analysis, specifically, for exploring the trends in demograph growth between 2006 and 2020

item.title: Managing Data Analysis with RStudio
item.description: Recent example of 1) interpreting models through graphs rather than parameters 2) using self-contains RMarkdown notebook vs .R + .Rmd split
